page.title: 16School Morning in Dumfries
page.content: Every morning except Saturday and Sunday I get up at 7.30 am to go to school. I usually get there at 8.10 am. We play about until 9.00 am. I am in Primary 7. My best friend is Paul Stakounis. My teacher is Mrs.O'Donnell. Every moning she takes in the lunch money. Then we start off our Maths from a text book which is called "Scottish Primary Mathematics Group". Our teacher has what she calls the "help!" table. It is always very busy. Nine pupils have already finished this book, which has 122 pages. Then we get our break from 10.35 to 10.50 am. Then we come in and do our English. We do a book called "Main Line English", also Reading Laboratory and a selection of other text books. At 12.30 we go to lunch.
